Sentencas: BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 (BZY) may be one of the most promising proton conductors for hydrogen separation membranes and proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of proton-conducting BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-δ electrolyte membranes: The effect of the M dopant

Sentencas: Doping strategies have been widely applied to improve the sintering activity and conductivity of BZY ceramics.
Titulo: Structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of proton-conducting BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-δ electrolyte membranes: The effect of the M dopant

Sentencas: In this study, the phase structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-delta (BZMY) compositions with various M cations of Zr4+, Ce4+, Pr3+, Nd3+, Sm3+ and Gd3+ with different ionic radii were comparatively studied.
Titulo: Structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of proton-conducting BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-δ electrolyte membranes: The effect of the M dopant

Sentencas: All the rare-earth dopants could improve the sinterability of BZY.
Titulo: Structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of proton-conducting BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-δ electrolyte membranes: The effect of the M dopant

Sentencas: As the ionic radii of the dopants decreased, the oxides are more and more stable in the CO2 atmosphere.
Titulo: Structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of proton-conducting BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-δ electrolyte membranes: The effect of the M dopant

Sentencas: EIS results indicated that a greater ionic conductivity was achieved for BZMY with a larger M dopant.
Titulo: Structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of proton-conducting BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-δ electrolyte membranes: The effect of the M dopant

Sentencas: Among the various composites, BZNY and BZCY showed favorable protonic conductivity at 600 degrees C in a wet 10% H-2-Ar atmosphere, with good sinterability and resistance to CO2 attack.
Titulo: Structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of proton-conducting BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-δ electrolyte membranes: The effect of the M dopant

Sentencas: A peak power density of 153 mW cm(-2) was achieved at 700 degrees C with a fuel cell that contained BZCY as an electrolyte and BSCF as a cathode.
Titulo: Structure, sinterability, chemical stability and conductivity of proton-conducting BaZr0.6M0.2Y0.2O3-δ electrolyte membranes: The effect of the M dopant
